title: Table
description: Table; Attributed to André-Charles Boulle (French, 1642 - 1732, master before 1666); France; about 1680 - 1690; Oak, spruce, alder, and mahogany veneered with brass, pewter, tortoiseshell, bone, horn, ivory, ebony, and stained and natural woods; brass, bronze, and gilt-bronze mounts; 81.9 x 116.5 x 66 cm (32 1/4 x 45 7/8 x 26 in.); 83.DA.22; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
